body.name: KACLUT Smart Watch,2-inch Utral Large HD Display,100M Waterproof Rugged Military Smartwatch with Bluetooth Call(Answer/Dial Calls) Extra Long Battery Life,Android Smart Watch for iPhone Compatible
features: ⌚【2" Full Touch Screen & Custom Wallpaper】The smartwatch for men features a 2" full touch screen with a resolution ratio of 320*386 providing excellent image quality. Bringing you a better visual effect. 5 levels of brightness adjustable. Clear reading of time and data even in bright light. You can customise the dial face with downloadable images in the FitCloudPro App, or use your own images and switch freely between personalised styles.

⌚【Bluetooth Calling and Smart Notifications】 This smart watch has a built-in HIFI speaker and microphone that allows you to make/receive calls and music playback directly from your smartwatch. The smart watches for men also support receiving notifications from various apps such as Facebook, WhatsApp, Twitter, SMS and social media which you can view directly on the fitness watch without having to take out your phone, giving you instant access to information while you enjoy exploring.

⌚【Military-Standard Verified】The military watch is specially designed for outdoor sports enthusiasts with military standards such as waterproof, shockproof. This tactical watch has passed dozens of standard tests such as harsh temperature, dust, salt spray. It features a fully enclosed ultra-thin microblasted metal frame and titanium casing to ensure durability, stability and functionality. Whether you are hiking, climbing or other outdoor activities, it will be a good companion for you.

⌚【Take Care of Your Health on Your Wrist】The android smart watch automatically measures your sleep to help you understand wakefulness, light and deep sleep data and remind you to adjust your sleep habits. Advanced health sensors and data provide insight to help you better understand your health. You can also access the FitCloudPro App for more information.

⌚【AI Voice Control & Practical Functions】With the''AI voice assistant'', you can control your phone by simply activating the AI voice assistant and speaking your commands. You can make phone calls, check the weather, and play music with just a voice command. Additionally, the mens smart watch offers a range of practical features such as alarms and timers, allowing you to stay organized and manage your schedule seamlessly.

⌚【100+ Sports Modes Fitness Tracker】The tactical smart watches for men cover 100+ sports modes: running, hiking, cycling, yoga, football, etc. Giving you access to data on all your favourite sports. whether you're a serious athlete or just want to keep fit, this smart watch for men allows you to monitor your heart rate, distance, speed and calorie burn in real time to help you exercise efficiently and achieve your fitness goals.

⌚【Great Compatibility & Satisfactory Service】Smart watches are compatible for Android 5.0 and above, IOS 9.0 and above smart phones. KACLUT smartwatch with 2 year warranty is suitable as an anniversary or birthday gift for your loved ones, family, and friends.When you receive the smart watches,if you have any problems,such as watch accessories, quality problem, charging problem and so on, please contact us and we will provide you a solution within 24 hours.

Does it support Android smart phone? Yes, it support both android and iPhone smart watch. Which APP does this smart watch use? You can download FitCloudPro from Google play or APP store. How to connect the watch to my phone? 1.Search “FitCloudPro” on Google Play or APP Store or scan the QR code to download. 2.Open the "FitCloudPro" APP, click the "+ Add Device" button on the "Devices" screen. 3. Scan the QR code on the watch Or Click "Search Now" and Tap "K-57" to pair. After my watch and mobile phone paired, all the sounds come from the watch, how to solve? 1. Slide down the watch screen 2. Tap the phone icon 3. Turn off the media audio Why is the weather on my watch not updated? After you paired your watch with your phone, the weather will automatically sync.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works amazingVery comfortable to wearCount steps and BPM very accurateLooks nice and classyHighly recommended !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It IS waterproof & rugged
reviews.reviewText: Often I miss an important call or text, my 12yo daughter said to get a smart watch. Knowing how hard I am on them, she found this one. After looking and comparing it with others, I ordered it.The pros are it is waterproof and rugged. Allows me to read just a small part of received text messages, send or receive calls, ànd some minimum health monitoring functions. Long lasting battery with in my case, over 18 days on one full charge.Has a few cons, definitely limited to design ypur own watch face as it allows the time and date placed over your pic. Preset colors, font and placement makes it difficult to fully design your own watch face. The preinstalled offerings are generic and with no options to down load any programs to add new ones.Although for the price it has few user functions and the ones it does have are fairly also generic to other smart watches. You cannot text from the watch or see the entire text message.For me, the only advantage of this smart watch is to alert me to calls or received text messages without having to pull out my phone constantly.The app you download to use the few options you can control, is sluggish but effective. You have to connect with the app to sync it to the watch, and the weather only syncs around every hour or so. Definitely not any real time sync other than the time.It would have received only 3☆, but because it did stay waterproof when I swim and rugged enough to withstand my daily wear, I gave it 4☆. Overall, not the best and certainly not the worse, just make sure and read what it will or will not do before purchasing, and your wants in a smart watch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality is great
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my husband. Worth it. It’s sturdy and does so much!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Great watch for 6 months then died. Seller will not respond at all.
reviews.reviewText: I loved this watch for 6 months. Then about halfway through the day it started acting weird. Light streaks started showing up and by the evening it was dead. Will not light the screen at all. Contacted Amazon and they gave me an online contact point for the seller. Filled out the form and never heard back from them. Checked spam folder regularly for about 10 days. They didn't care enough to even say your screwed. You probably will love this watch until it does the same thing to you. I just don't get it, why go through all the work to get reviews and make a product people want and then destroy your credibility like that?Are we all just that gullible?Bought a different Brand watch from another seller.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars The face is broke.
reviews.reviewText: The display is burning out. Lots of streaks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great health, smart watch
reviews.reviewText: I will start by saying this is the second watch. The first Identical watch was bad. When charging, the battery got so hot, you could not hold the watch. The caused the display to go out. I had it replaced with the same watch, due to all the good reviews.Second/ current smart watch as been working flawlessly for several months now. The battery live, with the way I have it set, continuously monitoring all heart rate, blood oxygen, your workouts, sleep, and even the other things it connect to on your phone, such as your calendar, text messages, phone calls, etc. The battery is lasting a long time with everything active on the watch. I charged it when I got it, here 9 weeks later, the battery is showing at 50%. So extremely long battery life.Some of the other things I like about this watch is 1) the large watch face, 2) You have many different watches to chose from, so you get to select the watch face that YOU want. 3) The app allows you to share your health data with other apps. I have to use Go365😒. It does not directly connect with Go365 (that is a Go365 issue). To get around this issue, it easily connects and shares your health data with Samsung Health, which does talk to Go365. Problem solved. 👍👍 my steps are getting to Go365, maybe not directly, but this smart watches app does talk to/ shares data with other health related apps.I really like the watch and do recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Its is a super basic smartwatch to see text notifications and do calls from but thats about it
reviews.reviewText: Pro:-Inexpensive-2 days battery life-its not super ugly.Cons:-The BP is so off the mark as to be comical.-The supposed app to obtain other faces cant be found. Others clearly have it, but it does not seem to exist anywhere I can find it.-The "registration" form to register the device asks for credit card info and support was clearly not able to handle this accurately. The support appears non-existent and sorely lacking.-No way to answer texts even with a canned message.-The sound is thin and tinny (its a watch, what can you really expect?)This is an okay watch if you are looking for something very basic that can handle calls and only text notifications and calls. You can probably find better at this same price range but you can for sure find cheaper that does the same.The real shame is that when the registration form asked for credit card info to register the device, I reached out to support which appears the only way to do so is to ask questions here. That was not as bad as the answer I got on that issue- reset the watch..... to correct a form on a webpage asking for credit card info? I dont think so.I have to suggest you stay away from this one. It was a mistake to purchase this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: After my initial 1 star review of their product, the company reached out to me and apologized for the inconvenience. They have been more than willing to make this right. They’ve been professional and courteous the entire time.I understand that things like this happen.Since the issue, I’ve been in contact with the company and they’ve handled the corrective actions very satisfactorily. Thank you.For added context my original review is below.I bought this watch in Jun to more accurately track my steps. My phone was only so good. I loved that feature of it. The other whistles and bells were ok but I really just wanted it for my steps. Recently my family and I went to the Dominican for vacation. After about 30 minutes in a 5-foot pool, the watch started to act funny. The screen was all over the place. Obviously, it got wet. I dried it with rice, but it never came back. It will not even charge.
